Title: [SPRINT-0][DEVOPS] Project & Environment Bootstrap
Body:
## Description
Initialize the project repositories, development standards, and base environment.

## Scope / Tasks
- [ ] Initialize mono-repo or multi-repo structure
- [ ] Define Git branching strategy
- [ ] Enable branch protection rules
- [ ] Define Docker base images
- [ ] Create initial README

## Acceptance Criteria
- Repositories created
- Branch protection enabled
- Base Dockerfiles committed
- README available

## Dependencies
- None

Title: [SPRINT-0][DEVOPS] Provision Dev Kubernetes Cluster
Body:
## Description
Provision a local development Kubernetes cluster.

## Scope / Tasks
- [ ] Provision cluster (kind/minikube)

## Acceptance Criteria
- Cluster accessible
- Namespaces created
- Ingress running

## Dependencies
- Docker installed
